profile_positions.description: Vestas, a global leader in sustainable energy solutions, joins the Mercedes-Benz EQ Formula E Team as a Principal Partner for the upcoming ABB FIA Formula E Championship season  with immediate effect. To activate this sponsorship for its various target groups, Vestas has appointed global travel and event specialist ATPI Sports Events. ATPI will be responsible for hospitality management, programme design and guest communications during the upcoming racing season.
profile_positions.title: Vestas / ATPI - Principal Partner Mercedes EQ Formula E Team - Project Lead Guest Experiences S6

profile_positions.description:
PERSBERICHT 22 APRIL 2020

Amsterdam, 22 april 2020 – SAIL Amsterdam 2020 gaat niet door. Daarmee respecteert en volgt SAIL de noodzakelijke maatregelen vanuit de bevoegde instanties. Met de nieuw aangekondigde maatregelen, inclusief een verbod op grote evenementen tot 1 september a.s., is het onmogelijk geworden om SAIL Amsterdam 2020 te organiseren. In zorgvuldige afstemming met de Gemeente Amsterdam, Port of Amsterdam, Provincie Noord-Holland en andere betrokken partners is de lastige beslissing genomen om SAIL pas weer te organiseren in 2025. 

We bedanken iedereen die de afgelopen tijd zo hard heeft gewerkt aan de voorbereiding van #SAIL2020. “Met pijn in het hart zijn we gedwongen deze beslissing te nemen, waarvan we overtuigd zijn dat dit de enig juiste is”, aldus Arie Jan de Waard, voorzitter Stichting SAIL Amsterdam. “Aan alle liefhebbers die reikhalzend naar SAIL hebben uitgekeken, vragen we begrip voor deze uitzonderlijke situatie. Dank aan alle Tall Ships, het varend erfgoed, schippers, bemanningen, sponsoren, partners, vrijwilligers en het SAIL-team voor al hun ongelofelijke inzet en betrokkenheid. Samen met de Gemeente Amsterdam gaan we hard aan het werk om SAIL in 2025 groots terug te laten keren. SAIL is dan één van de hoogtepunten in de viering van 750 jaar Amsterdam, als we bovendien 50 jaar én de 10e editie van SAIL vieren.”

www.sail.nl

profile_positions.location: ATPI Office during Pre Race and On site during Race Time
profile_positions.description:
In 2017-18 the most extreme sailing event of the globe takes place: the Volvo Ocean Race. 

The 2017-18 edition of the race sets sail from Alicante in October 2017 and will visit Lisbon, Cape Town, Melbourne, Hong Kong, Guangzhou, Auckland, Itajaí, Newport, Cardiff and Gothenburg before finishing in The Hague in summer 2018. 

Volvo Ocean Race has appointed ATPI Sports Events as its official hospitality agency for the 2017-18 edition. In this role ATPI Sports Events is responsible for the development, execution and sales of unique tailor-made guest experiences. 

In my role I am responsible for development and executions of the different guest experiences. This includes preparing, checking and updating project budget, daily management of ATPI team in NL office (10 persons) and an international team on site (6 persons), planning, logistics, site visits, negotiations with suppliers, creating and executing client programmes -Volvo Ocean Race experiences, accommodation search, spectator boat search, restaurant search  in all stopovers.

We have hosted over 17.000 unique guests during this edition of the Race, in 12 different host cities during 9 months.
profile_positions.title: VOLVO OCEAN RACE 2017-18 - Project Lead - Guest Experiences

profile_positions.description:
Gelderland will host the start of the Giro d’Italia in 2016. The Province of Gelderland and the municipalities of Apeldoorn, Arnhem and Nijmegen have jointly succeeded in bringing the top cycling event to the Netherlands.

ATPI Sports Events is sales partner for the Local Organising Committee as well as creator and advisor regarding local hospitality.

Preparation included preparing project budget, planning, logistics, site visits negotiations with suppliers and creating hospitality packages.
profile_positions.title: Giro de Italia - Big start Gelderland - Hospitality Advisor

profile_positions.description:
The Volvo Ocean Race is the world's premier round-the-world sailing competition. ATP Sports events is the travel and hospitality partner for TEAM BRUNEL and all its partners. As well as the hospitality partner for the Local Organising Committee for The Hague pitstop - Volvo Ocean Race Festival.

Preparation included preparing project budget, daily managing team of 12 persons, on site management, planning, logistics, site visits, negotiations with suppliers, creating client programmes -Volvo Ocean Race experiences, accommodation  search, spectator boat search, restaurant search for Pitstop The Hague and the other stopovers.

Execution of Hospitality Programme for Pitstop Scheveningen (18-20 June 2015) included: private coaches, social programmes (meetings, seminars, presentations, restaurants) accommodation, spectatator boats. Hospitality programmes for a total of 10.000-plus guests and daily managing  crew of 70 persons.
profile_positions.title: TEAM BRUNEL IN VOLVO OCEAN RACE 2014-2015 AND PITSTOP THE HAGUE JUNE 2015 - Projectlead

profile_positions.description:
ATP Event Experts is the Games Travel Office (GTO) provider for the Glasgow 2014 Commonwealth Games.

During 1 year plus preparation time as well as onsite during the Commonwealth Games 2014 overall responsible for preparation and execution of Spectator Packaging Programme, executed for Organisation Committee Glasgow 2014.

Preparation included preparing projectplan, project budget, daily managing and training team of 3 persons, planning, logistics,  ticket request with Glasgow 2014,  site visits, negotiations with suppliers, creating client programmes, accommodation  search, restaurant search and creating local experiences. Over 1500 packages were sold.

profile_positions.description:
During 2 year plus preparation time as well as onsite during the London Olympics 2012 overall responsible for preparation and execution of clients programmes (corporate clients, sponsors, private clients) and (individual) spectator experience (supporters, athletes’ families) . 
 
Preparation included preparing projectplan, project budget, daily managing team of 25 persons, planning, initial ticket request with London 2012 (LOCOG), initial accommodation request with London 2012 (LOCOG), logistics, site visits, negotiations with suppliers, creating client programmes, venue search for Holland Heineken House, accommodation/hotel search, restaurant search, contact with local embassy and creating local experiences
 
Execution included daily chartered flights, commercial flights, private coaches, social programmes (including local restaurants, excursions, workshops Holland Heineken House), ticketing, accommodation (13.000 roomnights in over 40 hotels) for a total of over 8000 guests and daily managing  crew of 125 persons.
profile_positions.title: LONDON 2012 OLYMPICS - Projectlead Hospitality activation sponsors TEAM NL

profile_positions.description:
During 2 year preparation time as well as onsite overall responsible for preparation and execution of clients programmes (corporate clients, sponosors, private clients) and spectator experience.

Preparation includedbudget, team (5 persons office NL and 5 persons during execution in each host city), planning, logistics and site visits, negotiations with suppliers, creating client programmes, accommodation search, restaurant search and creating local experiences

Execution included accommodation and social programmes (including spectator boats, hospitality sailing, local restaurants, excursions, workshops) for a total of over 6000 guests in 10 different host cities and christening of the 2 TEAM ABN AMRO V70's in both Portimao, Portugal and Rotterdam, Holland.
